featured.text: In one study, nearly 600 children from kindergarten to sixth grade took part in a nutrition curriculum intended to get them to eat more vegetables and whole grains.
For thousands of years, the Chinese have valued highly the soybean, considering it one of the five important grains (along with rice, millet, barley, and wheat).
To advocate the importance of vegetables and whole grains.

definition.zh_def: 穀物，特別是小型的種子，如小麥、稻米或玉米，通常用作食物或飼料。
definition.en_def: A small, hard seed, especially the seed of a cereal plant, used as food.
definition.example: Farmers harvest grain in the fall.
